"Double Saber":
"A Double Saber is a melee weapon with a wide attack range that's suited for a variety of situations.

Its PAs automatically generate a \"Kamaitachi\" whirlwind when used, which will damage nearby enemies for a short time. The Kamaitachi has multiple levels, and it can be raised to higher levels by landing more hits with PAs."

"The PA \"Julienne Dance\" lets you approach the enemy before performing a string of consecutive strikes on the spot.

After the approach, you have a chance to switch to a different attack, so you can switch up your moves based on the situation."
